titleStmt.title: Cicero redivivus, or, The art of oratory refin'd being two essays of elegancy : the first, containing plain and easie rules for scholars to make eloquent Latin, the second, usefull directions for young gentlemen and students to adorn their discourse and writings with a refin'd and genteel style / by John Twells, School-Master.
titleStmt.author: Twells, John, b. 1651 or 2.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
A general examination of the elegant grammar -- Scholastick prolusions to the art of oratory.
